items.name: Bisco's Leash
explicitMods: 1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills
flavourText: You were always there, by my side,
whether we sat or played.
Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

items.name: Mind Hail
explicitMods: +21% to Damage over Time Multiplier with Attack Skills

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 10% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
27% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

items.typeLine: Constant Quartz Flask of the Prism
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Carcass Jack
flavourText: "...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain +34% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.

An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants Elusive and a buff that grants Phasing. While you have this buff, monsters that enter an area around you will be Withered. Using a skill or losing the Elusive buff ends this skill's effects. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills. Cannot be used while already Elusive.
explicitMods:
Cannot be Cast or Triggered while Elusive
Grants Elusive
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
38% increased Effect of Elusive from this Skill
Inflicts 6 Withered Debuffs the first time each Enemy enters the Area

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports bow attack skills that fire arrows forwards as projectiles. These skills will instead fire a payload arrow into the air to land at a targeted location.
